title: Of All the Glowies That Ever Glowed
author: VD
content_html:
The fake “Patriot Front” organization is the most obviously Federal. As Ian Miles Cheong asks, how do they get away with driving vehicles without license plates? Also, as it appears in the video, how do they get away with having all their cars lined up in what looks like a no-parking zone without any police interference… after being escorted by police?

Of course, that’s all in addition to the fact that the police not only don’t interfere with them, but offer them protection and even help them exit their protests without permitting the media, Antifa, or anyone else to follow them. If, at this point, you still think they’re a legitimate and organic organization, you don’t even rise to the level of being literally retarded.

Pattern recognition, people. It’s called pattern recognition.

DISCUSS ON SG
